findings.title: Owner can change router and pair addresses
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify router and pair addresses.

findings.title: Owner can change charity, growth and fun addresses
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify charity, growth, and fun addresses without restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount and max wallet amount
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the maximum transaction amount and max wallet amount without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner Privileges: Modifiable Taxes
findings.description: The owner has the ability to change the reflection, charity, burn, fun and liquidity taxes.

findings.title: Owner can enable/disable autoliquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable autoliquidity, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change autoLiquidity threshold
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the autoLiquidity threshold.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the taxes, max wallet and max Tx
findings.description: The owner has privileges to exclude certain addresses from taxes, maximum wallet amount, and maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw Tendies
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw Tendies.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw any CRC20 tokens
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to withdraw any CRC20 tokens.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: OUT_OF_GAS exception in includeInReflections() function
findings.description: The function includeInReflections() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.

findings.title: OUT_OF_GAS exception in getCurrentSupplyTotals() function
findings.description: The function getCurrentSupplyTotals() uses a loop to evaluate total supply and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Initial maxTxAmount is zero
findings.description: The initial maximum transaction amount is set to zero.

findings.title: Sending tokens to burn address instead of decreasing total supply
findings.description: Instead of decreasing the total supply, tokens are sent to a burn address.
